title: HSBC profit disappoints as CEO Gulliver bows out
text:
HSBC profit disappoints as CEO Gulliver bows out 6:38pm IST - 01:48 
HSBC Holdings' pre-tax profit for 2017 more than doubled due to the absence of hefty restructuring costs incurred in the prior year but still lagged expectations as the bank took a writedown following U.S. tax changes.   it was the last results report for CEO Stuart Gulliver, who steps down on Tuesday.
